short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A virtual pet that shows on the screen and will accompany you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
------------
Petpat is a virtual pet to your screen, ready to accompany you throughout your day. 

Whether you're working, browsing, or taking a break, your virtual pet is always there to keep you company and add a touch of fun to your online experience. 

Please notice
-------------
- Due to restrictions related to google Chrome, the pet won't show on pages such as the "new tab". It will work on any other standard website.
- The permissions we request when installing the extension are required in order to "draw" the pet on the pages that you visit.
We absolutely do not collect or monitor any personal information from your browser.
- You can remove the extension by right clicking the icon added to your browser, and clicking "Remove from chrome".

Update 1.4.5
------------
- Capibara walk animation
- Cleaning poop by click it

Features
------------
- You can setup the hungry time and eating time for your own pomodoro timer
- Pet options
- It's Free!

Coming soon
-----------
- More pet will come
- Hygiene feature
- Pet voice
- Fix bugs
